content: in this legal case the viru county court has ruled that the defendant is responsible for paying procedural costs of 360 euros the court has made a decision to satisfy a claim for defaulting on payments on behalf of the republic of estonia the common property will be divided between two parties referred to as sk and vk sk will become the sole owner of a specific property and vk is obligated to make necessary entries in the land register the court has allowed a person identified as k to become the sole owner of the property and orders financial compensation for the loss of joint property and utility costs in favor of k k is also ordered to pay utility costs the court has determined that the procedural costs should be paid by the other party the judgment is immediately enforceable and the plaintiff has the right to file an appeal within 30 days the background of the case involves k and vk who were married and jointly purchased an apartment k now wants sole ownership of the apartment and claims that vk owes them money for utility costs the court has made a default judgment in favor of k dividing the joint property and ordering vk to give consent for the change in ownership vk is also ordered to pay financial compensation and utility costs to k the court determines that the procedural costs should be paid by vk
